definition: exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)
younger brother/junior male/I (modest word in letter)

sentences.english: Can a first cousin at one remove inherit the property?
sentences.chinese: 在堂表兄弟姐妹这一辈当中，他是唯一的男孩。

sentences.english: Su and Wen are cousins with an age difference of twenty-two years.
sentences.chinese: 兩人为相差二十二岁之表兄弟，情真意切，知己知彼。

sentences.english: My cousin is not part of my nuclear household.
sentences.chinese: 我的堂表兄弟姊妹并否则核心家里成员的一部份。

sentences.english: I had a cousin who worked in the U. S. Mint.
sentences.chinese: 我有个表兄弟在美国造币厂工作。

sentences.english: He factored his cousin's estate for five years.
sentences.chinese: 他经管他表兄弟的财产有五年之久。

sentences.english: Wang Wei soon got time interested in cycling too.
sentences.chinese: 很快，王薇使表兄弟也对骑车旅游产生了兴趣。

sentences.english: MAURICE JOYCE: When I was ten years old, one of my older cousins gave me a microscope.
sentences.chinese: 当我十岁，我的老表兄弟人给我一个显微镜。

sentences.english: It was infested with filth and vermin, including my cousins.
sentences.chinese: 那里面都是污秽和寄生虫，包括我的表兄弟在内。

sentences.english: Wang Wei soon got them interested in cycling too.
sentences.chinese: 很快，王薇使表兄弟也对骑车旅行产生了兴趣。

sentences.english: The cousins knew each other only by name.
sentences.chinese: 这两个表兄弟只是彼此知道名字而已。

definition: older male cousin via female line
brothers/younger brother/CL:個|个[ge4]/I, me (humble term used by men in public speech)/brotherly/fraternal
(of siblings) having the same father but different mothers/half (brother or sister)
(of siblings) having the same mother but different fathers/half (brother or sister)
husbands of sisters/brothers-in-law/extremely close (of a relationship)
younger male cousin via female line
